column14: I wished I'd known  this earlier but OGX hair products (now owned by Johnson & Johnson) contain DMDM Hydantoin.  I have used this shampoo for 3 years because I wanted  a sulfate free shampoo.  I noticed hair loss but attributed it to aging, but have been concerned.  I never suspected a hair care product could be causing this. I checked ingredients on back of renewing + aragan oil of morocco shampoo, and sure enough, DMDM, a form of formaldehyde used by Johnson & Johnson as a preservative, is listed as an ingredient.  Googling can kick up case info:  Whipple-v-Johnson and Johnson

column14: Well, a month ago, I'd have given this five stars, but the latest bottle I received is...essentially a completely different product.
